mapper.insert: insert into order_tbl(odr_code, mem_id, odr_name, odr_zipcode, odr_addr, odr_addr_d, odr_phone, odr_total_price, odr_count ) values(#{odr_code}, #{mem_id}, #{odr_name}, #{odr_zipcode}, #{odr_addr}, #{odr_addr_d}, #{odr_phone}, #{odr_total_price}, #{odr_count})
insert into order_detail_tbl(odr_code, pdt_num, odr_amount, odr_price) values(#{odr_code},#{pdt_num},#{odr_amount},#{odr_price})
mapper.select: select odr_code, odr_count, mem_id, odr_name, odr_zipcode, odr_addr, odr_addr_d, odr_phone, odr_total_price, odr_date from order_tbl where mem_id = #{mem_id}
